item.title: Client help
item.dc:creator: @Owner_satan Owner satan
item.description:
@Owner_satan wrote:

Lol use this code:

@echo off
Title Client
cd ./
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
pause

tell me if that works

item.title: Client help
item.dc:creator: @convince_me convince me
item.description:
@convince_me wrote:

well im useing spawned-pker client, i works fine for me but when others try to run it, the cmd box opens and quickly closes

@echo off
Title Client
cd ./
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
exit

^ that is what i have in the run box

Read full topic
